data.actual_result: During split screen, if Discord is not in focus, it will not actively update
data.expected_result: Discord should always be updating, even when not actively focused
data.short_description: Discord not responsive if not focused during split screen.
data.steps_to_repro: - (possibly Android Oreo specific?) - Open Discord on an active chat - Hold the app switcher button, initiating split screen - Select another valid app for split screen, and focus it by interacting with it - Wait a few seconds for people to be active on the Discord that you had open - Re-focus Discord
